p: Figure 3 shows the distribution of epidemic regions caused by FMD serotypes A ( n = 25) and O ( n = 40), and the standard deviational ellipses. The attributed values for the standard deviational ellipse are shown in Table 3. As shown in Fig. 3, the distribution of FMD serotypes A and O presented a directional trend and the angular rotations were 101.96° (northwest-southeast) and 100.33° (northwest-southeast). The geographic scope of FMD serotype O was larger than FMD serotype A.
